dialogue.introduction: Special-type destroyer, 'Akebono'. Hey! Don't look at me, you shitty Admiral!
dialogue.library_intro: Special-type destroyer number 18, 8th of the Ayanami-class, Akebono. I'm not a sumo wrestler. Remember that. I participated in the first naval air battle, the Coral Sea! But, I'm a bit uneasy around subs...
dialogue.secretary1: Why are you touching me? So annoying.
dialogue.secretary3: If you don't like me, why don't you remove me from the fleet?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Really, being alone make me feel relieved. I like being alone better... Yep.
dialogue.wedding: To call me out to such a place, you think you're so great, don't you, you shitty Admiral... I mean, what's with you confessing to me! Are you a masochist!?
dialogue.show_players_score: Hey, a telegram. Gonna read it?
dialogue.equipment1: Just this? Don't expect any thanks.
dialogue.equipment2: Using upgrade as an excuse, you really just want to see my naked body, don't you, you shitty Admiral!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: For me to get repaired.... I can't believe it.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I'm off, time to kick some heads!
dialogue.mvp: Major victory! Be thankful, you shitty Admiralâ™ª
dialogue.moderately_damaged: It... It's just my cannons and torpedoes and engine room that's busted....
dialogue.sunk: What lies at the bottom of the sea...?
dialogue.christmas_2014: Christmas? That has nothing to do with me, though. ...But well, I'll still have a cake... alright?
dialogue.new_year_2015: Shitty Admiral! Happy New Years and regards! What? At least do it right this year!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Haa? Chocolate? The hell are you talking about, you shitty admiral? ....Well I do have some though. Hurry up and take it! Here!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: D-Don't peek! You shitty Admiral! G-Geez!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Mid-summer, huh. Ushio, you should probably lose a little weight. Me? I'm fine.
dialogue.fall_2015: Huh? What I'm doing? I'm reading, duh. It's autumn, so why don't you go read something with words for once, you shitty admiral?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: I'm busy with cleaning for the new New Year! Ah, Shitty Admiral, you should move from there. You are in the way, move!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Shitty Admiral, it's Setsubun! Is it fine to throw beans at you and eat them? Piece of cake!
